The Surrogates is a five-issue comic book limited series written by Robert Venditti
, drawn by Brett Weldele, and published by Top Shelf Productions from 2005 to 
2006. In 2009 it was followed by a prequel graphic novel, The Surrogates: Flesh 
and Bone. It has been made into a film, Surrogates, starring Bruce Willis. ....
